freemarkerTextToGlueTransformer.freemarkerTemplate: <#list rows as row> <#assign patient_id>${row["patient_id"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign bionumerics_key>${row["bionumerics_key"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign id>${patient_id}_${bionumerics_key}</#assign> <#assign id>${id?replace("/","_")}</#assign> create custom-table-row patient "${id}" custom-table-row patient "${id}" set field patient_id "${patient_id}" set field bionumerics_key "${bionumerics_key}" exit </#list>
